title: Using the Elliptic Curve Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) for XML Digital Signatures
abstract:
This document specifies how to use Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) with XML Signatures.  The mechanism specified provides integrity, message authentication, and/or signer
authentication services for data of any type, whether located within the XML that includes the signature or included by reference.  This memo provides information for the Internet community.
